page.title: 04COPENACRE NEAR CORSHAM
page.content: Copenacre is owned by the Ministry of Defence. It is situated on the A4 in between Corsham and Rudloe. I have often wondered what it was and when I visited there I was quite surprised at the size of it.There are lots of tunnels under ground and the main part are called Spring Quarry, Monks Park and Hartham. Copenacre is a Royal Navy store depot. They store mostly electronics and they send them to ships. If it is an emergency they could send supplies to a ship within 24 hours. The new tunnels are not the only tunnels in Copenacre because the old ones are still there. Copenacre packs goods that they receive and sometimes they could get a package as big as a living room. Everything that goes to the ships goes by road. The emergency exits have 192 steps.
